name: Move Closer
tagline: Development, Mobile App, UX/UI, FB & Google Ads
description: Move Closer are an outstanding group of Designers, Developers and Growth Marketers with the flair and know-how to take your business to the next level. Our expertise are frequently in demand by global brands within the Telecoms, Consumer Goods and Real Estate industries. Whether you’re a corporate honcho looking for development support, or a start-up enthusiast looking to bring your idea to life, we’ve got you covered! We speak - English, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, German... Let’s Talk!
